title: Why I'm hit 52-week high Bank Nifty (even though FIIs are selling)
content:
For those who asked about earnings season:

Today's numbers:

Nifty: 24,712 (-0.75%)
Sensex: 80,787 (-0.73%)
Bank Nifty: 51,234 (+0.45%)
India VIX: 14.5
FII/DII: -892/+3,456 Cr

Consolidation before next move

Time will tell.
